attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in David Cameron following the decision to bomb Syria.
attributes.additional_details: The money that is being used for this would be better spent on backing up the NHS and Social Care and fighting extremism at a grass roots level. Bombing Syria will not stop people living here who have been radicalised!
attributes.background:
David Cameron has instigated war on behalf of the people of the U.K. that we do not want. All the intelligent evidence shows that bombing in Syria will only make ISIS stronger and make the U.K. more vulnerable.
Innocent people will be killed unnecessarily it's not right!!
